SourceProxy.name: ANLSubhaloFinder
SourceProxy.label: ANL Subhalo Finder
SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter assumes input similar to the output of the ANL Halo Finder's first output port. It runs the CosmoTools subhalo finder on specified halos to determine significant subclumps of particles.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input of the filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: Mode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies which halos the filter will process. When 'All Halos' is selected, all input halos will be processed. When 'Only Halos Larger Than Threshold' is selected, only halos with more than SizeThreshold particles will be processed. When 'Only Specified Halos' is selected, the halos whose ids are in the HalosToProcess list will be used.

IntVectorProperty.name: SizeThreshold
IntVectorProperty.label: Size Threshold
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This is the minimum size of a halo that will be processed if the filter is in 'Halos Larger Than Threshold' mode.

IntVectorProperty.name: HalosToProcess
IntVectorProperty.label: Halos To Process
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This list of halo ids which will be processed (if they exist in the data) by the filter when in 'Only Specified Halos' mode.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RL
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Box size
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The box side length used to wrap particles around if they exceed rL (or less than 0) in any dimension (only positive positions are allowed in the input, or they are wrapped around).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Overlap
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Overlap
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The space (in rL units) to extend processor particle ownership for ghost particles/cells. Needed for correct halo calculation when halos cross processor boundaries in parallel computation. Called DeadSize in the hacc config files.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BB
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Linking length
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Linking length measured in units of interparticle spacing and is dimensionless. Used to link particles into halos for the friends-of-friends (FOF) algorithm.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: AlphaFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Alpha Factor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: A tuning parameter of subhalo finding. This controls how aggressively small suhalos will be grown. Alpha factor of 1.0 is the least agrressive.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BetaFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Beta Factor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: A tuning parameter of subhalo finding. This controls how saddle points between subhalos are treated. Larger values allow identification of smaller scale structures such as tails.

IntVectorProperty.name: MinCandidateSize
IntVectorProperty.label: Minimum Subhalo Size
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: A subhalo candidate must have at least this many particles to be a subhalo.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumSPHNeighbors
IntVectorProperty.label: SPH Neighbors
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: A parameter of the subhalo finder.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumNeighbors
IntVectorProperty.label: Number of Neighbors
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The nearest X particles will be used to determine the local density in the subhalo finder where X is the value of this parameter.
